tasks.title: Audit Current Mobile UI Issues
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive analysis of current mobile interface issues including text sizing, spacing, contrast, and component positioning
tasks.details: Review all pages and components on mobile devices, document specific issues with screenshots, measure text sizes, check contrast ratios, and identify touch target sizing problems. Create a detailed audit report.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on multiple mobile devices and screen sizes (320px, 375px, 414px) to identify consistent issues across different viewports.

tasks.title: Implement Mobile-First CSS Foundation
tasks.description: Create mobile-first CSS foundation with proper breakpoints, typography scales, and spacing systems
tasks.details: Establish mobile-first CSS architecture with breakpoints at 320px, 375px, 414px, 768px+. Create responsive typography scale, consistent spacing system using CSS custom properties, and mobile-optimized color palette with proper contrast ratios.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate breakpoints work correctly, test typography legibility on mobile devices, and verify color contrast meets WCAG AA standards.

tasks.title: Optimize Header and Navigation for Mobile
tasks.description: Redesign header and navigation components for mobile-first experience with touch-friendly interactions
tasks.details: Implement hamburger menu for mobile, ensure touch targets are minimum 44px, optimize search bar for mobile input, improve cart and profile icons visibility and usability on mobile screens.
tasks.testStrategy: Test navigation usability on mobile devices, verify touch targets meet accessibility guidelines, and ensure smooth menu animations.

tasks.title: Redesign Homepage for Mobile Experience
tasks.description: Optimize homepage layout, hero sections, and content hierarchy for mobile-first user experience
tasks.details: Redesign hero banners for mobile viewport, optimize image loading and sizing, improve text readability and hierarchy, ensure CTAs are prominently placed and touch-friendly, optimize content sections for vertical mobile scrolling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test homepage loading performance on mobile networks, verify readability and user flow from top to bottom, and validate CTA effectiveness.

tasks.title: Optimize Product Listing Page for Mobile
tasks.description: Redesign product grid, filters, and sorting for optimal mobile browsing experience
tasks.details: Implement mobile-optimized product grid (1-2 columns), redesign filter interface as mobile-friendly drawer or accordion, optimize product card design for thumb navigation, ensure price and key info are easily readable.
tasks.testStrategy: Test product browsing flow on mobile, verify filter usability, and ensure product information is clearly visible and accessible.

tasks.title: Enhance Product Detail Pages for Mobile
tasks.description: Optimize product detail layout, image galleries, and customization options for mobile interaction
tasks.details: Implement mobile-optimized image gallery with touch gestures, redesign product information layout for mobile reading, optimize customization interface for touch interaction, ensure add-to-cart and customization CTAs are prominent and accessible.
tasks.testStrategy: Test image gallery gestures, verify product information readability, and validate customization flow on mobile devices.

tasks.title: Optimize Product Customization Interface
tasks.description: Redesign the jewelry customization flow for seamless mobile experience
tasks.details: Implement mobile-first step-by-step customization flow, optimize 3D viewer for mobile interaction, ensure dropdown menus and option selectors work well with touch input, provide clear visual feedback for selections.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete customization flow on mobile, verify 3D viewer performance and usability, and ensure all customization options are easily accessible.

tasks.title: Improve Shopping Cart and Checkout for Mobile
tasks.description: Optimize cart interface and checkout process for mobile conversion optimization
tasks.details: Redesign cart interface for mobile with clear item management, optimize checkout form for mobile input with proper keyboard types, implement guest checkout flow, ensure secure payment interface is mobile-friendly.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete purchase flow on mobile, verify form usability and input validation, and ensure payment process is smooth and secure.

tasks.title: Enhance User Dashboard and Account Pages
tasks.description: Optimize user account interface, order history, and profile management for mobile users
tasks.details: Redesign dashboard layout for mobile screens, optimize order history table for mobile viewing, ensure profile settings are easily editable on mobile, implement mobile-friendly navigation between account sections.
tasks.testStrategy: Test account management flow on mobile, verify data presentation clarity, and ensure all account functions are accessible via touch.

tasks.title: Optimize Typography and Readability
tasks.description: Implement mobile-optimized typography system with proper sizing, spacing, and contrast
tasks.details: Establish mobile typography scale with minimum 16px base font size, optimize line height and letter spacing for mobile reading, ensure sufficient color contrast for all text elements, implement responsive typography that scales appropriately.
tasks.testStrategy: Test text readability across different mobile devices and lighting conditions, verify contrast ratios meet accessibility standards.

tasks.title: Implement Touch-Friendly Interactive Elements
tasks.description: Ensure all buttons, links, and interactive elements meet mobile touch target requirements
tasks.details: Audit all interactive elements to ensure minimum 44px touch targets, optimize button sizing and spacing, implement appropriate touch feedback, ensure hover states translate well to touch interfaces.
tasks.testStrategy: Test interaction reliability on various mobile devices, verify touch target accessibility, and ensure no accidental activations occur.

tasks.title: Optimize Mobile Performance and Loading
tasks.description: Implement performance optimizations specifically for mobile networks and devices
tasks.details: Optimize images for mobile with responsive images and lazy loading, implement critical CSS inlining, minimize JavaScript bundles, add service worker for offline functionality, optimize font loading strategy.
tasks.testStrategy: Test loading performance on slow mobile networks, measure Core Web Vitals on mobile, and verify offline functionality works correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Mobile Accessibility Features
tasks.description: Ensure mobile interface meets accessibility standards and supports assistive technologies
tasks.details: Implement proper ARIA labels for mobile interactions, ensure keyboard navigation works with mobile screen readers, optimize focus management for mobile, add skip links and landmarks for mobile navigation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with mobile screen readers (VoiceOver, TalkBack), verify keyboard navigation, and validate against WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

tasks.title: Implement Mobile-Specific Features
tasks.description: Add mobile-specific functionality like PWA capabilities, touch gestures, and mobile payment options
tasks.details: Implement Progressive Web App features (service worker, manifest), add touch gesture support where appropriate, integrate mobile payment options (Apple Pay, Google Pay), implement mobile-specific sharing capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test PWA installation and offline functionality, verify mobile payment integration, and ensure gesture recognition works consistently.

tasks.title: Conduct Mobile User Testing and Optimization
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive mobile user testing and implement final optimizations
tasks.details: Conduct usability testing with real mobile users, A/B test key mobile interactions, analyze mobile analytics and user behavior, implement final optimizations based on testing results.
tasks.testStrategy: Gather user feedback on mobile experience, measure conversion improvements, and validate all optimization goals have been met.

metadata.description: Comprehensive mobile UI/UX optimization project for Facet & Co. luxury jewelry e-commerce platform
